articles.author: Taylor Herzlich
articles.title: Bitcoin surges to record high above $120K ahead of ‘Crypto Week’
articles.description: The cryptocurrency traded at $121,673.10 at 9:35 a.m. ET, after earlier in the session breaking past $122,000.
articles.content:
Bitcoin surged to a record high above $120,000 on Monday as institutional investors and corporations fueled a rally in the coins ETFs.
